subproject.corporate outcome: Expansion and access to financial services for the poor, employment and income generation and access to markets, goods and services.
subproject.description: This project aims at enhancing an improved livelihood of people with disabilities and youth with special needs, by providing them with social and vocational skills necessary for promoting their socio-economic integration opportunities. The overall project will provide a fully operational vocational rehabilitation center in Beit Ummar in the  Hebron Area, which will provide training and rehabilitation programs for disabled youth and youth with special education needs. UNDP/PAPP will implement all design and construction activities for the Vocational Rehabilitation Center in Beit Ummar, Hebron. Works will include: The first floor will be completely finished, Guard Room, Main Gates and Handrails, Main External Works around the building to make it reachable, those works includes some excavations, curbstone and simple landscaping, Secondary External Concrete Passages, Water Proofing: Related Materials to the outside Works, Connecting Electricity to the Project, and a generator and elevator.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: ILO Vocational Rehb Cntr
